function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unrestricted contact between people facilitating the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus, leading to increased infections and potential overload of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Enforcement of restrictions on contact, implementation of social distancing measures, and promotion of hygiene practices","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance systems, and communication tools for public health awareness","People":"General population, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of quarantine measures allowing unrestricted diffusion of COVID-19","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of the virus across regions, leading to higher infection rates and overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementation of quarantine measures, travel restrictions, and border controls to contain the spread","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking, border monitoring systems, and quarantine enforcement technologies","People":"Travelers, residents in affected regions, and border control authorities","Owner":"Government, border control agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring and control of infected individuals","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus and difficulty in identifying and isolating new cases, leading to higher community spread","Mitigation":"Enhanced testing capabilities, efficient contact tracing, and strict isolation protocols for infected individuals","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, contact tracing apps, and data management systems for tracking cases","People":"Healthcare workers, testing agencies, and public health departments","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare institutions"}]}
